thread.section_title: TrekEarth - South America Travel Photo Gallery
thread.title: Amazon Theatre

title: Amazon Theatre
text:
(47646) 2015-10-08 18:44 
Hi Maria An eye pulling night shot with its warm glow & colours of the proud building and detail well held under such testing low light conditions producing a fine visual impact. Well done, Congrats and tfs Best wishes (90107) 2015-10-08 23:28 
Hi Maria, Nice nightshot well managed, Lovely view with light on the facade. famous theater always interesting to see when the photo is wellmade. lousat (83568) 2015-10-09 1:24 
Hi Maria,the choice of the moment give a special atmopshere to the scene,an excellent capture of one of the symbols of Manaus,excellent exposure and very good sharpness too despite the difficult light.Have a nice weekend and thanks,Luciano (131494) 2015-10-09 2:27 
Hello avec les belles barrières quelle compo nocturne quel gestion des tons et lumière très très belle architecture sur ce théâtre superbe compo. Bravo et amitié
